#### Fonseca

<b>Consisto</b> -<b>is</b> -<b>stiti</b> -<b>stitum</b> -<b>ere</b>   <p> <b>1</b> &ensp; <small>Cic.</small> &ensp; parar, deter-se, pousar. <br> <b>2</b> &ensp; soster-se, estar firme, ser constante. <br> <b>3</b> &ensp; consistir, estar posto. </p>   <p><small>[EXEMPLOS]</small><br> <br><b>X</b><br>consistere in digitos &ensp; <small><small>Virg</small></small> &ensp; <small>Pôr-se nos bicos dos pés</small> <br> consistere milites &ensp; <small><small>Caes</small></small> &ensp; <small>Fazer a soldadesca alto, ou sustentar o posto</small> <br> consistere uitam tutam &ensp; <small><small>Lucr</small></small> &ensp; <small>Passar a vida socegada</small> <br> consistit stomachus &ensp; <small><small>Cels</small></small> &ensp; <small>Parão os vomitos</small> </p>
